thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: YPF says subsidiary being partly sold to GE worth $1.1-$1.24 bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: YPF says subsidiary being partly sold to GE worth $1.1-$1.24 bln
text:
BUENOS AIRES, March 5 (Reuters) - YPF Energia Electrica, the electricity subsidiary of Argentine state-owned oil company YPF SA which is being partly sold to General Electric Co , has an implied valuation of $1.1-$1.24 billion, YPF said on Monday.
GE plans to purchase a 25 percent stake in the subsidiary. YPF is also in discussions with an unnamed third party to sell an additional 25 percent stake, Chief Financial Officer Daniel Gonzalez said in the companyâ€™s fourth quarter 2017 earnings call. (Reporting by Luc Cohen)
